name: Hot Clam Dip IV
author: Mary Ann Recine
summary: Brimming with clams, this hot dip is sure to be a crowd pleaser! Serve it with crackers.
ingredients: 3 (6.5 ounce) cans minced clams, with juice
directions: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)

In a medium saucepan over medium low heat, slowly cook and stir the clams and lemon juice approximately 15 minutes In a separate medium saucepan over medium low heat, mix butter, green bell pepper, onion, garlic, oregano, parsley, hot pepper sauce and crushed red pepper
Slowly cook and stir until tender, about 15 minutes
Transfer the clam mixture and the butter mixture to an 8x8 inch baking dish
Mix in the seasoned bread crumbs
Bake in the preheated oven 20 minutes, until bubbly and lightly browned
